com.blockhaus2000.util.command

Interface SingleCommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleSingleCommand

    public interface SingleCommand
    This interface represents a help interface for implementing a usage-proof command method. Has to be used with the command system and the Command annotation.
    Author:
    Blockhaus2000

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCommand(CommandContext context)
      If you tag this with the Command annotation and register it to the DynamicPluginCommandManager and CommandManager (easyli with the CommandRegistrationUtil).

    • Method Detail

      • onCommand

        void onCommand(CommandContext context)
        If you tag this with the Command annotation and register it to the DynamicPluginCommandManager and CommandManager (easyli with the CommandRegistrationUtil).
        Parameters:
        context - The CommandContext of the executed command.
